proposed_strategy.name: Single Chunk Optimization
proposed_strategy.description: The entire document is consolidated into a single chunk as the total character count is well below the safety limit, maximizing efficiency.

execution_plan.description: Entire Prapathaka Six, Khandas 1 through 16, including the full commentary.

parsing_instructions.justification: The Khanda is the primary numbered section containing internal Mantras and detailed commentary, suitable for detailed parsing.

start_pattern.description: A new Khanda begins with a bolded heading, typically specifying its ordinal number.

end_pattern.description: The end of a Khanda is explicitly marked, either by the end of the Khanda itself or the end of its Bhāṣya (commentary).

parsing_instructions.pre_content_handling: The initial text starting with the Prapathaka heading should be handled as the introductory section of the sixth Prapathaka, preceding the first Khanda.
